content:
As an AI language model, I don't have access to current data on ARCO's products and services or their success in the market. However, here are some examples of successful products and services that ARCO has introduced in the past:

1. Gasoline with Techron: ARCO introduced Techron, a gasoline additive that helps keep engines clean, in the early 1990s. Since its introduction, it has become one of the most successful gasoline brands in the United States, and many other gasoline companies have added similar additives to their fuel.

2. ARCOSA Pipeline Services: In 2018, ARCO announced the formation of ARCOSA Pipeline Services, a new business segment focused on pipeline inspection and integrity management services. The company's range of inspection services includes ultrasonic testing, excavation, and corrosion analysis.

3. ArcLight Capital Partners: In 2001, ARCO co-founded ArcLight Capital Partners, a private equity firm that invests in energy infrastructure. ArcLight has become one of the largest private equity firms in the energy industry and manages over $22 billion in assets.

These examples demonstrate ARCO's ability to innovate and adapt to changing market conditions by introducing new products and services that meet customer needs.
